title: Ovintiv to Sell Anadarko Oil, Gas Assets for $3 Billion
description: Ovintiv Inc. agreed to sell its Anadarko oil and natural gas assets to an undisclosed buyer for cash proceeds of $3 billion, according to a statement Tuesday.
content: Ovintiv Inc. agreed to sell its Anadarko oil and natural gas assets to an undisclosed buyer for cash proceeds of $3 billion, according to a statement Tuesday.
